title: Logarithm Calculator: log, ln, log‚Çê(x), change of base | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: General definition: \(\log_b(x) = y \iff b^y = x\) Change of base: \(\log_b(x) = \frac{\ln(x)}{\ln(b)} = \frac{\log_{10}(x)}{\log_{10}(b)}\) Common log (base 10): \(\log_{10}(x)\) Natural log (base e): \(\ln(x)\)
